instructions:
Place apples in a buttered 1 1/2 quart baking dish. Add water. Combine flour, sugar, butter, cinnamon and
salt, rubbing with your fingers until it forms crumbs. Spread the crumbs over the apples and bake in a 375 F
oven for 40 minutes uncovered.
ingredients: 5 cups baking apples, peeled, cored and sliced
name: Apple Crisp
creator: Carol Decker
